OOC:: I remember all that BlackFortress is in a cave, underground and 
near to AVOlcano...


Blackfortress/Kali/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite/Celeno/Attilla/Thyphon/Shivah::

BlackFortress's computers detected two bots unknow outside the base, 
in surface. Darkfate Frowned "Kali and  Celeno, go to find out who's 
our visitor"

The femmes left the base. The dragon typied a command and soon Aelo, 
Celeno and Ocipite left the base too. Attilla and Shivah left Thyphon 
in a cr.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Nighteyes had set herself up monitoring the Black Fortress. 
There had 
> been alot of activity there, and if an oppertunity to attack opened 
itself up 
> she was to report back to Hell Beast immedietly. Next to her loomed 
the new 
> bot, Craken. He was really strange and quiet. Nighteyes didnt 
suspect he 
> would remain with Hell Beasts group for very long.
>        "Alright, Im reciving some transmissions from the base. 
Looks like all 
> we do now is wait." She said as she glanced at a green screen that 
streamed 
> with data.
>        Her counter part nodded. "This is good. If they do detect 
us..." He 
> said. Nighteyes wasnt sure if he was asking a question, or making a 
statement.
>        She went back to monitoring, while Craken stared off into 
the distance 
> on his own.
